rooms.description: Open space with a traditional Kerala style entrance featuring stone work and wood detailing.
A comfortable seating area for guests, adjacent to the entrance, with large windows and sliding doors.
Spacious living area with Kerala-style woodwork and open layout for family gatherings.
Adjacent to the kitchen with traditional motifs and ample seating.
Fully equipped modern kitchen integrated with storage space, designed for easy wheelchair accessibility.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom with grab bars and non-slip flooring.
A spacious master bedroom with an attached en-suite bathroom and private balcony, designed for comfort and privacy.
Traditional Kerala-style bedroom incorporating natural light and ventilation.
Another bedroom in the same style with sufficient space for family members.
Small living area and bedroom for servants located adjacent to service areas.
Dedicated study room/library with ample natural light and quiet atmosphere.
Multipurpose space that can serve as an office or guest bedroom.
